title: Meta blocks Russian state media from running ads worldwide
content:
Facebook’s parent company Meta announced it’s prohibiting the Russian state media to run ads or monetize on all of its platforms during the conflict with Ukraine. Facebook is another big tech group to announce sanctions against the Russian Federation.

more…

The post Meta blocks Russian state media from running ads worldwide appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Facebook's parent company Meta announced it's prohibiting the Russian state media to run ads or monetize on all of its platforms.
